## Read in excel file

```{r read_data}
## Import
```

## Create the table lists

```{r create_tables}
source("R/create_tables.R")
```


```{r render_tables_function}

RenderTables <- function(table.list, title, filename) {
  for (i in 1:length(table.list)) {
    print(kable(table.list[[i]],
                caption = paste0(names(table.list[i]), 
                                 title, sep = " "),
                format = "latex",
                align = "l",
                booktabs = TRUE,
                longtable = FALSE,
                linesep = "") %>%
            kableExtra::kable_styling(
              position = "left",
              latex_options = c("striped", "repeat_header", "scale_down"),
              stripe_color = "gray!15",
              full_width = FALSE,
              font_size = 20) %>%
            row_spec(row = 0, background = "#048CBD") %>%
            save_kable(., paste("figures/", names(table.list[i]), filename, ".pdf"), keep_tex = FALSE)) 
    cat("\n")
  }
}

```


```{r render_table2}
RenderTables(export.table1, 
             title = " Watershed and Reaches: Change in Tree Canopy and Supporting Metrics",
             filename = "Canopy")
RenderTables(export.table2,
             title = " Watershed and Reaches: Change in Impervious Cover and Supporting Metrics",
             filename = "Impervious")
```
